滭滭滭

滭字的基本解释

滭
bì
（泉水）涌出：滭沸。滭浡（水涌得很急）。

滭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bì］
［《廣韻》卑吉切，入質，幫。］
见“滭浡”。

滭字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　滭； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页643第27
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?壁吉切，音必。泉沸也。同觱。【詩·小雅】觱沸檻泉。　又【司馬相如·上林賦】滭弗宓汨。【註】滭弗，盛貌。　【集韻】與㳼同。

滭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
滭字的起名意思

暂无。

Xiao
Basic explanation of words
Xiao
bì
(Spring water) gushing out: boiling. Xiaoxun (the water is rushing very quickly).
Xiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bì］
["Guangyun" Beiji cuts, enters the quality, helps. ]
See "滭浡".
Xiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Water Word Department] 　滭; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 643 27
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Biji cut, the sound must be. The spring is boiling too. Same thing. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Boiling threshold spring.　[Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu] Hofumi. [Note] Xin Fu, grand appearance.　【Jiyun】Same as 㳼.
